1.1.name: wordpress/wp-ezimerchant
1.1.description: Easily ecommerce enable any WordPress page or post. World's best PayPal integration - allows for freight calculation in PayPal checkout flow. Manage refunds and authorisation and capture of funds. Accept credit cards directly via PCI compliant gateway with payment page matched up seamlessly with your WordPress theme. Requires a free ezimerchant account.
